resources.string: Use a multisig wallet for maximum safety. A multisig wallet has multiple signersâ€”if one is compromised, your funds are still safe.
To use Taproot, please note the following

If you are sending bitcoin from an exchange or a service to this wallet, please make absolutely sure that they support sending to Bech32m addresses. <font color=\'#D2232A\'>There has been reports of loss of funds.</font>
If you plan to use hardware keys in the wallet, please make sure that they support Taproot as well. If you are unsure, use software keys only.
